name: Mahindra Thar
description: The Mahindra Thar is a rugged SUV with an iconic design and excellent off-road capabilities. It comes with a choice of petrol and diesel engines, and offers advanced features like touchscreen infotainment and cruise control.

name: Mahindra Tuv 300
description: The TUV 300 is a 7 seater 3 cylinder car and has length of 3995mm, width of 1795mm and a wheelbase of 2680mm.

name: Land Rover Defender
description: The Land Rover Defender is a series of British off-road cars and pickup trucks. They consistently have four-wheel drive, and were developed in the 1980s

name: Mahindra XUV300
description: The Mahindra XUV300 is a stylish and spacious SUV with a range of advanced features. It comes with a choice of petrol and diesel engines, and offers excellent performance and fuel efficiency.

name: Range Rover Sports
description: Land Rover is crafted to reflect bold design with genuine capability & composure at heart. A reflection of modernity. Captivating in its simplicity.

name: Jeep Wrangler
description: Jeep Wrangler is a 5 seater SUV available in a price range of Rs. 59.05 - 63.05 Lakh*. It is available in 2 variants, a 1998 cc, BS6 and a single Automatic.

name: Mercedes Benz G-Class G550
description: Mercedes-Benz G-Class is a 5 seater SUV available in a price range of Rs. 1.72 - 2.55 Crore. It is available in 2 variants, 2925 to 3982 cc engine options.

name: Tata Safari
description: With the All-New Tata Safari, no matter where it's taken, the refined ride & handling and a thrilling drive powers the journey. With the 170 PS Kryotec Engine

name: Toyota Fortuner
description: The Toyota Fortuner is a powerful SUV with a bold and rugged design. It comes with a choice of petrol and diesel engines,and offers advanced features like a touchscreen infotainment system, automatic climate control, and a panoramic sunroof.

name: Mahindra Scorpio Classic
description: Introducing new Mahindra Scorpio Classic with a new imposing look at the front, an all-new powerful mHAWK engine, premium interiors.
